articles.author: Adam Sabes
articles.title: Conservatives call out multinational corporations for supporting pride month in America, but not Middle East - Fox Business
articles.description: Conservatives on Twitter are calling out multinational corporations for displaying a pride flag-theamed logo on American social media accounts, but not for those overseas.
articles.content:
Conservatives on Twitter are calling out several multinational corporations for showing their support for pride month in America, but not in regions such as the Middle East.
Companies such as BMW, P… [+2345 chars]
